item.title: Third Week ‚Äî Exam Preparation and New Challenges
item.description:
üìå Week of June 9 to June 15

The main event of the week was active preparation for exams. In the evenings, we gathered at the library ‚Äî working together to solve economics problems and creating cheat sheets for information theory (just for knowledge checking üòâ).

In programming class, we worked on a mini-project: a simple expense tracking application. It was useful to apply theory in practice.

It was a bit tough to balance studying and sports, but I managed to make it to volleyball practice.
